info.title: Product API
info.description: Handles all product definitions and rule sets related to products, SIC codes and global rules.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all products.

Requires the products_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new product.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a single product, including its currently active set of rules.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a products definition.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a product from the system.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.summary: Get all rules for a programme
get.description:
Get a paginated list of all rule sets in the system for a programme. Can use a date to search for the active rule sets.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all rule sets.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to use to query for active rule sets on that date.

post.description:
Create a new rule set.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single rule set from a programme.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a rule.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a rule set.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a paginated list of all SIC codes.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all SIC codes.

post.description:
Add a new SIC code to the system.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single SIC code.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a SIC code.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Removes a SIC code from the system.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all programmes.

Requires the product_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all results.

post.description:
Create a new programme on the system.

Requires the products_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get a single programme.

Requires the products_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a programme.

Requires the product_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a programme.

Requires the product_remover role to access.

get.description: Get principal purposes for a programme

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.
